Caleb Femi (a mụrụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye Britain-Nigerian na-ede akwụkwọ, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-ese foto, na onye bụbu onye mmeri nke ndị na-eto eto maka London
E nyere nchịkọta uri izizi ya, Poor, ihe nrite Forward Prize for Poetry

A mụrụ Femi n'afọ 1990 na Kano, Nigeria, ebe nne nne ya zụlitere ya. Mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa, ọ kwagara isonyere nne na nna ya na North Peckham Estate na London. Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gụrụ Bekee na Queen Mary, Mahadum nke London
Site na 2014 ruo 2016 Femi kụziri Bekee na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Tottenham

N'afọ 2016, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye mbụ na-eto eto nwetara ihe nrite maka London. Na 30 Julaị 2020, o bipụtara nchịkọta uri izizi ya, nke akpọrọ Poor, nke meriri Forward Prize's Felix Dennis Prize for Best First Collection na Ọktọba 2021.
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Femi emeela ma wepụta obere ihe nkiri anọ, na-eje ozi dị ka onye edemede / onye nduzi na nke ọ bụla:
A kpọrọ Femi onyr mara mma site na magazin Dazed nke 2025 Dazed100, ndepụta nke ọgbọ ọzọ na-akpụzi omenala ndị ntorobịa.
